### How to Work with Complex Models: IT Model Averaging

```{r global-model}
# Global model
library(arm)
phys_data<-data.frame(
	Year=c(2014,2014),
	Trmmol_night=c(0.605764342,0.374118061),
	VPD_N = c(0.907746724,0.907746724)
	)

fit_all <- lm(Trmmol_night ~ VPD_N, data=phys_data)
str(phys_data)
str(fit_all)
stdz.model<-arm::standardize(fit_all)
```
